any.message: ARIA role is allowed for given element

passes.help: Headings should not be empty

any.message: Element has text that is visible to screen readers

passes.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

none.message: Form field does not have multiple label elements

nodes.html: <input type="text" class="form-control" name="q" autocomplete="off" id="searchBarInput" placeholder="Aradığınız Ürün veya Tasarımcıyı Yazınız" value="">

passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct
passes.help: Heading levels should only increase by one

ancestry: html > body > header:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h6
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h1:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(1) > h3:nth-child(2)
html > body > div:nth-child(5) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div > h3:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(3) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div > h4:nth-child(1)
html > body > footer:nth-child(7) > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div > h4:nth-child(1)

any.message: Heading order valid

none.message: Value of lang attribute is included in the list of valid languages
